title: Thanh Lac Trai
typeOfFood: Vegan, Buffet, Fast food, Take-out, Vietnamese
description: Standard traditional Vietnamese vegie fare, with a display of vegetable and mock meats from which to choose, accompanied by rice, plus a menu on the wall - in Vietnamese only - featuring several noodle dishes, hot-pot, fried rice, and rice pastry cakes. Basically undecorated. Hoang Dieu is one street north of the main east-west drag, Phan Boi Chau.
